channel.title: Comments for page "Withstand a Poisoning!"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Withstand a Poisoning!"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: All "minor/secondary" items that related to bloodline-themes are no at the game anymore, only "main/mojor" that needed for PW. This won't be forever maybe… Thanks for helping, I'll hide oldy text in few minutes :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I just did this mission with the listed theme on, failed to get any loot, did it again with SBS and once again got nothing, but it also didn't display the +5% thing that it normally does. Obviously something is wrong with the information, if anyone knows what in particular let me know.
